nodes.text: He voiced Owen Lars in Phineas and Ferb: Star Wars, and participated in the LucasArts games Sam & Max Hit the Road (voicing Max), Full Throttle, Day of the Tentacle, Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis, Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb, and Escape from Monkey Island.
